00070 #ifndef _INFOSINK_INCLUDED_
00071 #define _INFOSINK_INCLUDED_
00072 
00073 #include "../Include/Common.h"
00074 #include <math.h>
00075 
00076 //
00077 // TPrefixType is used to centralize how info log messages start.
00078 // See below.
00079 //
00080 enum TPrefixType
00081 {
00082    EPrefixNone,
00083    EPrefixWarning,
00084    EPrefixError,
00085    EPrefixInternalError,
00086    EPrefixUnimplemented,
00087    EPrefixNote
00088 };
00089 
00090 enum TOutputStream
00091 {
00092    ENull = 0,
00093    EDebugger = 0x01,
00094    EStdOut = 0x02,
00095    EString = 0x04,
00096 };
00097 //
00098 // Encapsulate info logs for all objects that have them.
00099 //
00100 // The methods are a general set of tools for getting a variety of
00101 // messages and types inserted into the log.
00102 //
00103 class TInfoSinkBase
00104 {
00105 public:
00106    TInfoSinkBase() : outputStream(4)
00107    {
00108    }
00109    void erase()
00110    {
00111       sink.erase();
00112    }
00113    TInfoSinkBase& operator<<(const TPersistString& t)
00114    {
00115       append(t); return *this;
00116    }
00117    TInfoSinkBase& operator<<(char c)
00118    {
00119       append(1, c); return *this;
00120    }
00121    TInfoSinkBase& operator<<(const char* s)
00122    {
00123       append(s); return *this;
00124    }
00125    TInfoSinkBase& operator<<(int n)
00126    {
00127       append(String(n)); return *this;
00128    }
00129    TInfoSinkBase& operator<<(const unsigned int n)
00130    {
00131       append(String(n)); return *this;
00132    }
00133    TInfoSinkBase& operator<<(float n)
00134    {
00135       char buf[40]; 
00136       sprintf(buf, (fabs(n) > 1e-8 && fabs(n) < 1e8) || n == 0.0f ?
00137               "%f" : "%g", n);
00138       append(buf); 
00139       return *this;
00140    }
00141    TInfoSinkBase& operator+(const TPersistString& t)
00142    {
00143       append(t); return *this;
00144    }
00145    TInfoSinkBase& operator+(const TString& t)
00146    {
00147       append(t); return *this;
00148    }
00149    TInfoSinkBase& operator<<(const TString& t)
00150    {
00151       append(t); return *this;
00152    }
00153    TInfoSinkBase& operator+(const char* s)
00154    {
00155       append(s); return *this;
00156    }
00157    const char* c_str() const
00158    {
00159       return sink.c_str();
00160    }
00161    void prefix(TPrefixType message)
00162    {
00163       switch (message)
00164       {
00165       case EPrefixNone:                                      break;
00166       case EPrefixWarning:       append("WARNING: ");        break;
00167       case EPrefixError:         append("ERROR: ");          break;
00168       case EPrefixInternalError: append("INTERNAL ERROR: "); break;
00169       case EPrefixUnimplemented: append("UNIMPLEMENTED: ");  break;
00170       case EPrefixNote:          append("NOTE: ");           break;
00171       default:                   append("UNKOWN ERROR: ");   break;
00172       }
00173    }
00174    void location(TSourceLoc loc)
00175    {
00176       append(FormatSourceLoc(loc).c_str());
00177       append(": ");
00178    }
00179    void message(TPrefixType message, const char* s)
00180    {
00181       prefix(message);
00182       append(s);
00183       append("\n");
00184    }
00185    void message(TPrefixType message, const char* s, TSourceLoc loc)
00186    {
00187       prefix(message);
00188       location(loc);
00189       append(s);
00190       append("\n");
00191    }
00192 
00193    void setOutputStream(int output = 4)
00194    {
00195       outputStream = output;
00196    }
00197 
00198 protected:
00199    void append(const char *s); 
00200 
00201    void append(int count, char c);
00202    void append(const TPersistString& t);
00203    void append(const TString& t);
00204 
00205    void checkMem(size_t growth)
00206    {
00207       if (sink.capacity() < sink.size() + growth + 2)
00208          sink.reserve(sink.capacity() +  sink.capacity() / 2);
00209    }
00210    void appendToStream(const char* s);
00211    TPersistString sink;
00212    int outputStream;
00213 };
00214 
00215 class TInfoSink
00216 {
00217 public:
00218    TInfoSinkBase info;
00219    TInfoSinkBase debug;
00220 };
00221 
00222 #endif // _INFOSINK_INCLUDED_
